nars.core

Class NARBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.core.Parameters
      • nars.core.NARBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConceptBuilder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultNARBuilder

    public abstract class NARBuilder
extends Parameters
implements ConceptBuilder
    NAR design parameters which define a NAR at initialization. These do not change at runtime. For runtime parameters, @see Param
